testcase.classname: Feature to test registration functionality to Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC1- User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user is in main page..................................................passed When user choose register tap...............................................passed And fill all data and click register button.................................passed Then user navigate to user page.............................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test login functionality to Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC2- User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user is in login page.................................................passed When user add valid username and password and click login button............passed Then user navigate to home page.............................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test password recover functionality to Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC3- User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user is in login page and forget password.............................passed When user choose forget password link and add his email.....................passed Then Confirmation message should appear to user to check mail...............passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test search functionality to Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC4- Logged User could search for any product
testcase.system-out: Given user login to nop commerce web application............................passed When search for product.....................................................passed Then results should appear correctly........................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Change Currency functionality to Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC5- Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given user login to nop commerce............................................passed When change current currency to another.....................................passed Then currency should changed correctly......................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Hover and Select Product functionality in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC6- Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given user login to Application.............................................passed When Hover over any category and select subcategory.........................passed Then the sub category page should appear correctly..........................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test filter Products with color functionality in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC7- Logged user could filter with color
testcase.system-out: Given user login to the application.........................................passed When user select subcategory and filter with specific color.................passed Then filtered results should appear correctly...............................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test select different tags in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC8- Logged user could select different tags
testcase.system-out: Given user login to the app.................................................passed When user select hover Computers categories and select Notebooks sub category.passed Then Notebooks page should start correctly..................................passed And user select hover Apparel categories and select Shoes sub category......passed Then Shoes page should appear correctly.....................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test add different products to shopping card in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC9- Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given user login correctly..................................................passed When user add one product from Notebooks in computer category to shopping card.passed And user add one product from Shoes in Apparel category to shopping card....passed Then the selected two products should added and appear correctly in shopping card.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test add different products to White List in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC10- Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given user login correctly to the app.......................................passed When user add one product from Notebooks in computer category to White List.passed And user add one product from Shoes in Apparel category to White List.......passed Then the selected two products should added correctly.......................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test add different products to Compare List in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC11- Logged user could add different products to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given user login Successfully...............................................passed When user add one product from Notebooks in computer category to Compare List.passed And user add one product from Shoes in Apparel category to Compare List.....passed Then the selected two products should added and appear correctly............passed

testcase.classname: Feature to Create Successful Order in Nop Commerce web application
testcase.name: SC12- Create successful Order
testcase.system-out: Given user login Successfully to Nop Commerce App...........................passed When user click go to card button and complete checkout.....................passed Then order should created successfully......................................passed
